ModMetaData.name: Log Walls 1.0-1.4
ModMetaData.author: Harry_Robinson
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.34
Brings back the old Log Walls from Alpha 4. Log Walls cost 8 wood instead of 5, but have 330hp instead of 225hp and take a third of the time to build as a wooden wall. \n\nOriginally by ItchyFlea, updated by Harry_Robinson.
